title: What’s a life worth to the EPA? – This Week in Cleantech
description: On this episode of the This Week in Cleantech podcast, Maxine Joselow from the New York Times discusses the EPA's decision to stop assigning a dollar value to lives saved in cost-benefit analyses for major air pollution rules.
content: On this episode of the This Week in Cleantech podcast, Maxine Joselow from the New York Times discusses the EPA's decision to stop assigning a dollar value to lives saved in cost-benefit analyses for major air pollution rules.
